name: Master of Time
description:
A game where you have to plow through dungeons and defeat bosses. There are 3 bosses you have to defeat in order to win the game. You have to slow down time, kill enemies and survive dungeons.

If you can't get the game to work or you don't want to donwload it, watch the walkthrough video.

WASD - walk around LMB - shoot SPACE - interact with objects SHIFT - slow down time R - recall from a dungeon ENTER - next message (if auto play is disabled)
